langdetect

Class Tokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • langdetect.Tokenizer

  • public class Tokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a tokenizer that splits a given text into n-grams. The n-grams are stored in a profile that has to be passed to the tokenizer. After adding all n-grams, the profile is finalized and represents the text's frequency profile.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke
